title: Project
description: An object containing information about a project. Projects are purely organizational objects containing references to various associated resoures.

bundles.title: Bundles
bundles.description: A collection of bundles associated with this project.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: A collection of people who have contributed to this project, and their role.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: A collection of languages that are included in this project. A dialectology project might included many languages here, whereas a project aimed at documenting a particular language variety might include just one or two.

lexicons.title: Lexicons
lexicons.description: A collection of lexicons that are included in this project.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: A collection of locations associated with this project.

media.title: Media
media.description: A collection of media objects associated with this project.

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.description: A collection of speakers associated with this project.

texts.title: Texts
texts.description: A collection of texts associated with this project.
